allow: Bash(npx jest --testNamePattern="should add warning when balance is low but sufficient" --no-coverage)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve CI failures in linting and tests

- Migrate ESLint to v9 flat config for backend/shared
- Keep frontend on ESLint v8 \(Next.js 14 compatibility\)
- Fix Jest mock hoisting in service tests by using inline mocks
- Fix estimateSlippage calculation in clob-client.service
- Remove unused imports across backend and frontend
- Update test assertions for floating point precision

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
